TopicTitle: How Do I get maneuvers tool?

Articles.Content:
Hi, sorry for the silly question, but in carrer mode, when or how do I get the maneuvers available? I thought that a level 2 tracking station was sufficient, but obviously I was wrong.

Thanks for the answer.
if i'm not mistaken you have to upgrade mission control as well
Actually, I think you were right the first time? There is a tiny chance that you may also need a level 2 Mission Control -- but I'm not sure about that.

Yes.

You need level 2 mission control as well as level 2 tracking center.

This should really be more clearly spelled out somewhere in the game.
